Management

  • How do I edit the home page of the Open Referral API portal? - The home page of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the APIs.json (yaml) for this project.
  • How do I edit the getting started page for the Open Referral API portal? - The getting started of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the getting started YAML file for this project.
  • How do I edit the authentication page for the Open Referral API portal? - The authentication of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the authenitcation YAML file for this project.
  • How do I edit the FAQ page for the Open Referral API portal? - The FAQ of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the FAQ YAML file for this project.
  • How do I edit the documentation page for the Open Referral API portal? - The documentation of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the OpenAPI YAML file for this project, following the OpenAPI specification.
  • How do I edit the code page for the Open Referral API portal? - The code of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the FAQ YAML file for this project.
  • How do I edit the road map page for the Open Referral API portal? - The road map of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the road map YAML file for this project.
  • How do I edit the issues page for the Open Referral API portal? - The issues of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the issues YAML file for this project.
  • How do I edit the change log page for the Open Referral API portal? - The change log of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the change log YAML file for this project.
  • How do I edit the terms of service page for the Open Referral API portal? - The terms of service of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the terms of service page for this project.
  • How do I edit the privacy policy page for the Open Referral API portal? - The privacy policy of the developer portal is entirely dynamic and generated using the change log YAML file for this project.

We will add new questions to the list as they get asked via support channels. Make sure and also checkout the support page, blog, change log, and road map to see if your question has been answered but not added here yet.
